active_learning.discussion_prompt: In a group discussion, debate the challenges of auditing PKI components like CA key ceremonies and CRL management in a hybrid cloud environment. How do GAO CPAG and NIST SP 800-53A address these, and what publication risks arise from public disclosure requirements?
active_learning.peer_teaching: Explain the key concepts to a partner without using technical jargon.
active_learning.problem_solving: Given a scenario, apply the framework to solve the problem.

distractor_protocol.step: Identify common misconceptions about the topic
Ensure distractors are similar in length and complexity
Include partial truths that require deeper understanding

flashcard_generation.system_prompt: You are an expert flashcard generator for cybersecurity education, specializing in PKI audits under Compliance Audit Standards. Topic: 'Audit Report Generation and Publication' (Hierarchy: Cybersecurity > 001_Cryptography > 009_PKI > 009_Audit,Compliance,Monitoring > Compliance Audit Standards > Audit Report Generation and Publication). Incorporate these elements: - **Learning Objectives** (use verbatim): [insert the 6 objectives above]. Generate 40-50 flashcards balanced across Bloom's levels (10 Remember/Understand, 15 Apply/Analyze, 15 Evaluate/Create, 10 mixed). - **Active Learning**: Embed hints in explanations (e.g., 'Apply to peer teaching: Teach this step'). - **Scaffolding**: Distribute flashcards: 10 Layer 1, 15 Layer 2, 15 Layer 3, 10 Layer 4. - **Content Enrichment**: Use provided research + PKI specifics (CA audits, cert lifecycle, NIST SP 800-57, WebTrust, ETSI EN 319 411). Sources: GAO CPAG (https://www.gao.gov/assets/870/862242.pdf), NIST SP 800-53r5 (https://nvlpubs.nist.gov/nistpubs/SpecialPublications/NIST.SP.800-53r5.pdf), SP 800-53Ar5 (https://csrc.nist.gov/pubs/sp/800/53/a/r5/final), SP 800-57 (https://csrc.nist.gov/pubs/sp/800/57/pt3/r1/final), WebTrust for CAs (https://www.webtrust.org/), ETSI EN 319 411 (https://www.etsi.org/deliver/etsi_en/319400_319499/31941101/02.02.01_60/en_31941101v020201p.pdf). **Flashcard Output Format** (JSON array of objects): [ { "id": 1, "bloom_level": "Remember", "scaffolding_layer": 1, "front": "Question text? A) Distractor1 B) Correct C) Distractor2 D) Distractor3", "back": { "correct_answer": "B", "explanation": "Detailed explanation...", "references": ["GAO CPAG p.10"], "active_learning_hint": "Discussion: ..." } } ] Ensure variety: 60% multiple-choice, 20% cloze deletion, 20% short answer. High-quality, error-free, PKI-focused. Prioritize voter consensus (completeness, pedagogy).
